original: @235b * // rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @235b * // rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: sarba bh'a sha pra wa rta na by'a ka ra na sh'astra /
analyzed: sarba bh'a sha pra wa rta na by'a ka ra na sh'astra /
translated: Sarvabhāṣapravartanavyākaraṇāṣṭra

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: smra ba kun la 'jug pa'i sgra'i bstan bcos /🔽thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: smra ba kun la 'jug pa'i sgra'i bstan bcos / thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: The Treatise on Grammar Entering All Languages🔽Homage to the Omniscient One.

original: kun mkhyen la ni phyag 'tshal nas //
analyzed: kun mkhyen la ni phyag 'tshal nas //
translated: Having paid homage to the Omniscient One,

original: gsal bar sbyor ba bsnyad par bya //
analyzed: gsal bar sbyor ba bsnyad par bya //
translated: I shall explain the clear application.

original: zin pa dang ni ma zin dang // gnyis ka dag las byung ba'i sgra //
analyzed: zin pa dang ni ma zin dang // gnyis ka dag las byung ba'i sgra //
translated: Sounds arise from the grasped, the ungrasped, and both,

original: sems can ston dang mi ston dag / lung du ston dang mi ston pa'o //
analyzed: sems can ston dang mi ston dag / lung du ston dang mi ston pa'o //
translated: From sentient beings and non-sentient beings, and are not taught.

original: gang zhig gang gi dus la ni //
analyzed: gang zhig gang gi dus la ni //
translated: Whatever is established at whatever time

original: gang bsgrub phyir ni sgra grag pa //
analyzed: gang bsgrub phyir ni sgra grag pa //
translated: For the sake of which a sound is heard,

original: de yis de dag ston pa'i phyir //
analyzed: de yis de dag ston pa'i phyir //
translated: By that, they are taught,🔽Therefore, the expressed, the expresser,

original: de yi brjod bya rjod byed dang // 'brel dang / dgos pa bsnyad par bya //
analyzed: de yi brjod bya rjod byed dang // 'brel dang / dgos pa bsnyad par bya //
translated: The connection, and the purpose should be explained.

original: mi mthun mi shes rigs sel ba'i //
analyzed: mi mthun mi shes rigs sel ba'i //
translated: The incompatible, the unknown, and the elimination of the class,

original: thog mar brjod pa'i sgra gang zhig / bsdus dang byed ldan dus la ni //
analyzed: thog mar brjod pa'i sgra gang zhig / bsdus dang byed ldan dus la ni //
translated: First, whatever sound is expressed,

original: bstan bya yongs su ston pa'i phyir //
analyzed: bstan bya yongs su ston pa'i phyir //
translated: In order to fully teach the object of expression,🔽The agent, and the time,

original: de dag nyid mthun sgra brjod pa //
analyzed: de dag nyid mthun sgra brjod pa //
translated: The sounds of the names of those are expressed in harmony.🔽

original: brjod bya rjod byed dag tu 'dod //
analyzed: brjod bya rjod byed dag tu 'dod //
translated: They are called the “expressible” and the “expression. ”

original: mtshon par byed dang / mtshon bya la //
analyzed: mtshon par byed dang / mtshon bya la //
translated: The “signified” and the “signifier”

original: 'brel dang dgos ba shes par bya //
analyzed: 'brel dang dgos ba shes par bya //
translated: are to be understood in terms of the relation and the purpose.

original: rigs sel ba dang dus sel dang // ched dang ming du gdags dang bzhi //
analyzed: rigs sel ba dang dus sel dang // ched dang ming du gdags dang bzhi //
translated: There are four: the exclusion of the type, the exclusion of time, the exclusion of purpose, and the exclusion of designation.

original: mi ldan sgra ni yod ma yin /
analyzed: mi ldan sgra ni yod ma yin /
translated: There is no such thing as a word that does not apply.

original: 'dzam bu'i 'bras bu smin pa ni //
analyzed: 'dzam bu'i 'bras bu smin pa ni //
translated: When the ripe fruit of the rose-apple tree

original: dri ma med pa'i chu la lhung //
analyzed: dri ma med pa'i chu la lhung //
translated: falls into the clear water,

original: nya yis bza' ba'i ched du ni //
analyzed: nya yis bza' ba'i ched du ni //
translated: the fish, for the sake of eating it,

original: 'gu lu 'gu lu zhes su smra //
analyzed: 'gu lu 'gu lu zhes su smra //
translated: says “gurgle gurgle.”

original: tshogs pas bskyed pa'i chos rnams ni //
analyzed: tshogs pas bskyed pa'i chos rnams ni //
translated: The phenomena that are produced by a collection

original: byas pas 'jig pa'i dus dag la //
analyzed: byas pas 'jig pa'i dus dag la //
translated: are destroyed by being made.

original: gang zhig de shes 'dod pa'i phyir //
analyzed: gang zhig de shes 'dod pa'i phyir //
translated: For the sake of knowing that,

original: mi rtag ces ni brjod pa yin //
analyzed: mi rtag ces ni brjod pa yin //
translated: it is said to be impermanent.

original: rigs sel ji ltar yin zhe na //🔽'khor dang mya ngan 'das pa 'am //
analyzed: rigs sel ji ltar yin zhe na // 'khor dang mya ngan 'das pa 'am //
translated: How is it the exclusion of the type?🔽Whatever is taught in terms of saṃsāra and nirvāṇa

original: lung du mi ston dngos gang zhig / bstan pas don gzhan gcod pa'o //
analyzed: lung du mi ston dngos gang zhig / bstan pas don gzhan gcod pa'o //
translated: or the neutral things, by teaching it, another meaning is excluded.

original: spyi la 'jug pa bstan pa na /
analyzed: spyi la 'jug pa bstan pa na /
translated: When the engagement in the general is taught,

original: mi shes pa ni sel bar byed //
analyzed: mi shes pa ni sel bar byed //
translated: ignorance is eliminated.

original: rigs kyi 'dom pa bsal byas nas //
analyzed: rigs kyi 'dom pa bsal byas nas //
translated: Having thus eliminated the particular,

original: spyi yi mtshan nyid brjod par bya //
analyzed: spyi yi mtshan nyid brjod par bya //
translated: The general characteristics will be stated.

original: dus sel ji ltar yin zhe na //
analyzed: dus sel ji ltar yin zhe na //
translated: How is the elimination of time?

original: dngos de gnas skabs thams cad pa //
analyzed: dngos de gnas skabs thams cad pa //
translated: The entity is included in all states.

original: bsdus sogs gang du bsgyur ba der //
analyzed: bsdus sogs gang du bsgyur ba der //
translated: Wherever it is transformed, such as in “collected,”

original: khyad par gzhan rnams gcod byed yin //
analyzed: khyad par gzhan rnams gcod byed yin //
translated: It is the eliminator of other distinctions.

original: dus kyi 'dom pa sel ba ni //
analyzed: dus kyi 'dom pa sel ba ni //
translated: The elimination of the particular of time

original: rang gi mtshan nyid ston pa yin //
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid ston pa yin //
translated: Is the teaching of its own characteristic.

original: gnyis dang rnam grangs sogs rnams kyi //
analyzed: gnyis dang rnam grangs sogs rnams kyi //
translated: In the case of “two,” “enumeration,” and so on,

original: gang du byed tshig mi gnas pa //
analyzed: gang du byed tshig mi gnas pa //
translated: Where the verbal action does not abide,

original: de ni mdo ru bsdus pa ste //
analyzed: de ni mdo ru bsdus pa ste //
translated: That is summarized in the sutra.

original: mdor bsdus de yang bcu bzhir 'dod //
analyzed: mdor bsdus de yang bcu bzhir 'dod //
translated: That summary is also asserted to be fourteen.

original: tshig gnyis dang ni rnam grangs @236a * //
analyzed: tshig gnyis dang ni rnam grangs @236a * //
translated: Two words, enumeration,

original: dang // tshig don gzhan dang byed tshig drug / khyad par dang ni 'bru mang po //
analyzed: dang // tshig don gzhan dang byed tshig drug / khyad par dang ni 'bru mang po //
translated: Other word meanings, six verbal actions, distinction, and many syllables,

original: bye brag gzhi bsdu gcig tu bsdu //
analyzed: bye brag gzhi bsdu gcig tu bsdu //
translated: The particular basis is summarized as one.

original: zlas dbye ba gnyis de'i skyes bu //
analyzed: zlas dbye ba gnyis de'i skyes bu //
translated: The two alternatives are its person.

original: zad par mi 'gyur las 'dzin yin //
analyzed: zad par mi 'gyur las 'dzin yin //
translated: It is inexhaustible and holds karma.

original: byed pa'i dus ni de nyid la //
analyzed: byed pa'i dus ni de nyid la //
translated: The time of the agent is just that.

original: the tshom gcod byed 'dus byas yin //
analyzed: the tshom gcod byed 'dus byas yin //
translated: The determiner of doubt is the conditioned.

original: de yang las dang byed pa dang // ched dang 'byung khungs 'brel pa dang // gzhi dang zla bsdu lhag bcas dang // dgag sgrub brnan dang bdag po dang // rgyan dang kha skong dus la 'jug /'byed sdud gzhan gcod gnyis pa dang // gcig gi tshig dang gnyis kyi tshig / mang po'i tshig dang rtags can dang //
analyzed: de yang las dang byed pa dang // ched dang 'byung khungs 'brel pa dang // gzhi dang zla bsdu lhag bcas dang // dgag sgrub brnan dang bdag po dang // rgyan dang kha skong dus la 'jug /'byed sdud gzhan gcod gnyis pa dang // gcig gi tshig dang gnyis kyi tshig / mang po'i tshig dang rtags can dang //
translated: ornament, supplementation, engagement in time,🔽division, inclusion, exclusion of another,🔽second,🔽first,🔽many,🔽sign,🔽end,🔽middle,🔽near,🔽far,

original: mtha' yi tshig dang dbus kyi tshig / nye dang ring la snyeg pa dang // mngon du ba dang lkog tu gyur //
analyzed: mtha' yi tshig dang dbus kyi tshig / nye dang ring la snyeg pa dang // mngon du ba dang lkog tu gyur //
translated: approached,🔽concealed,🔽very concealed,🔽question,

original: rab tu lkog la snyeg pa dang // dri dang lan gyi tshig dang ni //🔽bdag dang gzhan dang sbyor ba'i tshig / sum cu lnga ni byed ldan dus //
analyzed: rab tu lkog la snyeg pa dang // dri dang lan gyi tshig dang ni // bdag dang gzhan dang sbyor ba'i tshig / sum cu lnga ni byed ldan dus //
translated: answer,🔽self,🔽other,🔽and application.

original: rigs dang dus gsal byas nas ni ;
analyzed: rigs dang dus gsal byas nas ni ;
translated: Having clarified the class and time,

original: / bstan bya gang zhig ston pa de //
analyzed: / bstan bya gang zhig ston pa de //
translated: whatever is to be taught is taught.

original: de ni ched du 'dod pa yin //
analyzed: de ni ched du 'dod pa yin //
translated: That is asserted as the purpose.

original: ched kyi dbye ba ji snyed pa //
analyzed: ched kyi dbye ba ji snyed pa //
translated: As many divisions of purpose

original: dus kyi tshig gis shes par bya //
analyzed: dus kyi tshig gis shes par bya //
translated: as there are should be known by the word time.

original: ji snyed don gyi sbyor ba ni //
analyzed: ji snyed don gyi sbyor ba ni //
translated: The application of the meaning of however many [words]

original: gang la 'jug pa de snyed pa //
analyzed: gang la 'jug pa de snyed pa //
translated: is however many [words] that are applied.

original: gang gis ston pa'i yi ge de //
analyzed: gang gis ston pa'i yi ge de //
translated: The letters by which it is taught

original: de ni ming du gdags pa yin //
analyzed: de ni ming du gdags pa yin //
translated: are designated as names.

original: sgra'i bstan bcos smra ba kun la 'jug pa zhes bya ba sbyor ba bzhi dang ldan pa slob dpon chen po su bh'a sha k'i rtis mdzad pa rdzogs so//
analyzed: sgra'i bstan bcos smra ba kun la 'jug pa zhes bya ba sbyor ba bzhi dang ldan pa slob dpon chen po su bh'a sha k'i rtis mdzad pa rdzogs so//
translated: The treatise on grammar called Application to All composed by the great master Subhāsakṛti, endowed with four applications, is complete.
